data.database_description: The database tracks student and teacher information, including addresses, assessments, behavior incidents, detentions, and rental details. It uses reference tables for incident and detention types to standardize descriptions. The schema supports detailed records of interactions between students, teachers, and administrative actions, enabling comprehensive management and analysis of educational data.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code representing the type of address.
Description of the address type.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Reference table for address types, providing standardized codes and descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code for each type of detention.
Detailed description of the detention type.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Reference table for different types of detentions with their descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code for each type of incident.
Description of the incident type.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Reference table mapping incident type codes to their descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each address.
First line of the address.
Second line of the address, if applicable.
Third line of the address, if applicable.
City where the address is located.
Zip code or postcode for the address.
State, province, or county where the address is located.
Country where the address is located.
Additional details about the address.

sample_data: 1, 020 Orie Canyon, North Loyceville, 197, Hawaii, USA
2, 1333 Boyle Lane, West Sean, 937, Illinois, USA
3, 027 Kim Divide Apt. 492, Beierview, 918, Texas, USA
enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores detailed address information for various entities.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each student.
Foreign key referencing the address of the student in the Addresses table.
First name of the student.
Middle name of the student.
Last name of the student.
Mobile phone number of the student.
Email address of the student.
Date when the student first rented something (likely a university housing or vehicle).
Date when the student left the university.
Additional details about the student, such as honors or special notes.

sample_data: 1, 19, Emma, Frederic, Rohan, 235.899.9744, derrick.jenkins@example.com, 2017-12-05 15:20:04, 2018-03-03 03:33:05, first honor
2, 9, Louvenia, Fatima, Hansen, 1-247-673-8446, rohan.clarabelle@example.org, 2017-08-08 22:30:36, 2018-02-24 11:12:11, first honor
3, 10, Rhea, Gardner, Bergnaum, 1-751-162-9676x115, kkirlin@example.org, 2017-11-15 04:57:28, 2018-03-19 12:49:20, first honor
enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about students, including personal details and academic records.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each teacher.
Identifier linking the teacher to their address record.
First name of the teacher.
Middle name of the teacher.
Last name of the teacher.
Gender identifier for the teacher.
Mobile phone number of the teacher.
Email address of the teacher.
Additional information or notes about the teacher.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Contains information about teachers, including personal details and contact information.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each assessment note.
Identifier linking the note to a specific student.
Identifier linking the note to a specific teacher who made the assessment.
Date and time when the assessment notes were recorded.
Detailed text of the assessment or interaction notes.
Additional information or comments related to the assessment notes.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores notes related to student assessments, including interactions between students and teachers.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each behavior incident.
Code referencing the type of incident.
Identifier for the student involved in the incident.
Start date and time of the incident.
End date and time of the incident.
Summary of the incident.
Recommendations for addressing the incident.
Additional details about the incident.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records of incidents involving students, including details about the incident type, date, summary, and recommendations.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each detention record.
Code referencing the type of detention.
Identifier for the teacher who issued the detention.
Start time of the detention.
End time of the detention.
Summary or brief description of the detention incident.
Additional details about the detention, if any.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records of detentions issued to students, including details about the type, teacher involved, and time period.

columns.columnDescription: Identifier for the student.
Foreign key linking to the Addresses table.
Start date of the address assignment.
End date of the address assignment.
Monthly rental cost for the address.
Additional details about the address assignment.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about addresses assigned to students, including rental details.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for a student.
Unique identifier for a detention record.
Unique identifier for a behavior incident associated with the detention.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Records of students who are involved in detentions, including the specific detention and incident details.
